name: Atlas Shrugged
description:
Arkanoid-like pongesque pinball kinda christmas game about the mighty Atlas and how he shrugs.

How to play:
  • Press A to move left
  • Press D to move right
  • Hold LMB and drag mouse to shrug Atlases wings

Win condition - defeat evil tree

EPILEPSY WARNING

THIS GAME CONTAINS FAST FLASHING IMAGES AND LOUD SOUNDS.  IT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT AND TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.
